product_name: Outdoor Research Centrifuge Pants - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made of wind- and water-resistant fleece, the women's Outdoor Research Centrifuge Pants block cold air and release excess heat when you're on the move. Front and upper-back leg panels are 100% polyester 2-layer fleece. Lower back leg panels and back yoke are breathable, stretchy Radiant LT  polyester fleece with spandex for extra mobility. Polygiene(R) active odor control keeps you fresh after a long day of exertion. Flatlock seams eliminate chafing; drawcord waist fine-tunes the fit. Outdoor Research Centrifuge Pants feature zippered waist pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Made of wind- and water-resistant fleece, the women's Outdoor Research Centrifuge Pants block cold air and release excess heat when you're on the move.
